amendment.description: To enhance the services available to members of the Armed Forces returning from deployment in Operation Iraqi Freedom and Operation Enduring Freedom to assist such members, and their family members, in transitioning to civilian life.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4264 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4264 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S6377-6392) To enhance the services available to members of the Armed Forces returning from deployment in Operation Iraqi Freedom and Operation Enduring Freedom to assist such members, and their family members, in transitioning to civilian life.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4264 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4264 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton.
